snippet.title: The Witcher 2 - PC - Hope
snippet.description:
A captivating story, dynamic combat system, beautiful graphics, and everything else that made the original Witcher such a great game are now executed in a much more advanced and sophisticated way.

The Witcher 2 is now available on PC.
Join the community on http://www.facebook.com/thewitcher or get more information on your local http://www.namcobandaigames.eu website
